original_text: And the side chambers were in three stories, one over another, thirty in each story. There were offsets all around the wall of the temple to serve as supports for the side chambers, so that they should not be supported by the wall of the temple.
korean_text: 골방은 삼 층인데 골방 위에 골방이 있어 모두 서른이라 그 삼면 골방이 성전 벽 밖으로 그 벽에 붙어 있는 성전 벽 속을 뚫지는 아니하였으며

sentences.original_text: And the side chambers were in three stories
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 곁방은 세 층으로 되어 있었고

sentences.original_text: There were offsets all around the wall of the temple
to serve as supports for the side chambers
so that they should not be supported by the wall of the temple
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 곁방들이 성전 벽에 의해 지지되지 않게 하였다
